history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03200
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROMOTING WOMEN PARTICIPATION AND EQUITABLE REPRESENTATION IN AND BY POLITICAL PARTIES, GIVING INCENTIVES THEREFOR, CREATING THE WOMEN IN POLITICAL PARTIES EMPOWERMENT FUND, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Welfare

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Under deliberation by the Mother Committee on 2018-08-08
          -19th Mother Committee Meeting. Initial consideration of the bill.
      2. Under deliberation by the Mother Committee on 2018-09-05
          -21st Mother Committee Meeting. Continuation of consideration of the Draft Substitute Bill re Gender-Based Street, Public and Online Spaces Act in substitution of House Bill Numbered 5213, 5781 and 5956.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WOMEN AND GENDER EQUALITY ON 2016-08-30
